name: Deepwater Kings
author: Xekon#8266
description: Raising from the depths of the ocean, transmuted by ancient magic.
lore:
In ages long past, within the ancient elven kingdom of Elenoria, a group of ambitious and power-hungry elves delved deep into the forbidden arts of necromancy. These renegade elves were known as the Darkweavers, and under their dark influence, they sought to wield power over life and death, defying the natural order of the world.

As the corruption of necromancy spread through their ranks, it became clear to the ruling council of Elenoria that decisive action was needed to prevent the malevolent practices from consuming their society entirely. The council, led by the wise and compassionate High King Alarion, reluctantly made the decision to banish the Darkweavers and their followers from their ancestral homeland.

Thus, the Deepwater Kings were born â€“ a race of elves cast out from the lush forests and shining cities of Elenoria, condemned to exile beneath the ocean's depths. High King Alarion invoked ancient and powerful magic, creating a massive chasm in the ocean floor that swallowed the renegades' city whole, submerging it beneath the waves. The dark waters flooded into the once-thriving city, sealing the fate of the Darkweavers and their followers.

Condemned to the watery depths, the exiled elves found themselves transformed by their forced isolation and the potent magic swirling around them. Over time, their once-pale skin adapted to the depths, taking on a faintly luminescent hue that allowed them to see in the darkest ocean depths. Their eyes, now reflecting the bioluminescent beauty of the sea, adjusted to the lack of light and gained the ability to perceive the tiniest movements in the water.

As the elves adapted to their new underwater existence, they discovered hidden underwater caverns and ancient ruins where they could rebuild their society. They forged a new civilization, embracing the magic of the ocean and harmonizing with its creatures. The Deepwater Kings became skilled in controlling the currents, harnessing the power of the tides, and communicating with the sea's denizens.

Though they were initially tainted by the darkness of necromancy, the centuries of exile led them to seek redemption and forge a new path. They vowed never again to dabble in forbidden arts and instead embraced the elemental magic of water and life. They became protectors of the ocean's balance, defending it from any threats that arose and striving to maintain the delicate harmony of the undersea world.

As time passed, the Deepwater Kings honed their abilities and became a formidable force, both in water and on land. Their banishment, though a punishment, had transformed them into a new race of elves, uniquely connected to the sea and its mysteries. They became known as wise and compassionate beings, harboring a deep respect for life and death, having learned firsthand the consequences of wielding power recklessly.

Thus, the Deepwater Kings now stand as guardians of the ocean's secrets, seeking to restore their honor and prove to the world that they are more than their dark past. Their story serves as a reminder that even from the darkest depths of exile, redemption and rebirth are possible.

king_mount.name: Depthbound King on Moonlight Kelpie
king_mount.description: Riding a magical beast of the ocean into countless raids on the land dwellers.

prophet.name: Prophet
prophet.description: Using twisted prophecies to bring down pain upon their foes.

tideweaver.name: Tideweaver
tideweaver.description: Emerging from the depths of the abyss, this wizard is not to be trifled with.

soulflayer.name: Soulflayer
soulflayer.description: This cruel individual enslaves their enemies souls to fuel their sinister magic.

tallyman_hybrid.name: Tallyman Hybrid
tallyman_hybrid.description: Counting the souls of the restless depths together with a many-tentacled bodyguard.

thralls.name: Depthbound Thralls
thralls.description: Enslaved by ritualistic magic, these thralls march ever forward.

guard.name: Guardians on Bloodreef Eels
guard.description: Enslaved by ancient spell and clad in cursed armor.

predator.name: Depthbound Predators on Giant Shark
predator.description: Cursed Pack Hunters, striving to slay ever greater prey.

discipline.name: Discipline
discipline.description: This unit and all friendly units within 6" ignore Shock when making any Overwatch or Defensive Stance reaction rolls.

barbed_net.name: Barbed Net
barbed_net.description: Units hit by this weapon half their movement until the end of the turn.

ranger_tactics.name: Raider Tactics
ranger_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

warrior.name: Battle Prayer
warrior.description:
When this unit is activated, choose a Blessing for this unit or a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" to receive until the end of the turn:
* Divine Shield: Roll a die when a model in this unit loses a wound. On a value of 1 or 2 that wound is not lost.
* Righteous Fury: When this unit fights, hit rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional attack.
* Healing Word: One model in the unit immediately heals D3 wounds.

curse.name: Dark Prophecies
curse.description:
When this unit is activated, choose a Curse for an enemy _Infantry_ unit within 6" to receive until the end of the turn:
* Blinding Ink: This unit has -1 Strength and Accuracy when fighting or making a shooting attack.
* Brittle Bones: When this unit is targeted by an attack, hit rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional attack.
* Soul Siphon: One model in the unit immediately takes 2 hits with AP2.

blind.name: Blind
blind.description: Target enemy unit within 12" gets -1 Accuracy until the end of the round.

shroud.name: Shroud
shroud.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets -1 to be hit the next time it is attacked.

pain.name: Pain
pain.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

expedient_retreat.name: Expedient Retreat
expedient_retreat.flavor: The Sea Elves are not equipped for long, attrition-based battles. Instead, they employ hit and run tactics to wear down their enemy without taking may losses themselves.
expedient_retreat.description: Use after one of your _Infantry_ units finishes taking a Shooting action. You may immediately take a free move action. You may not charge with a unit in the same round that it has been affected by this strategy.

shroud.name: Shroud
shroud.flavor: Clad in a mystical cloak of shadows, even the deadliest attack can be evaded.
shroud.description: Use this strategy when an elven keeper unit is targeted by an enemy unit. That unit gets -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength for this attack.

shifting_tide.name: Shifting Tide
shifting_tide.description: Use when taking a skill test. You may increase or decrease the value of that test by 1.
shifting_tide.flavor: Like the sea Fate is flowing along and is ever changing.
